EmailTemplate.subject: You're Invited
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[http://pivotal.io/event/pivotal-cloud-native-roadshow/paris]]> Learn to be cloud native with experts from Pivotal.
Casey West, Principal Technologist
Kenny Bastani, Spring Developer Advocate
Fred Melo, Director, Technical Marketing
Over the course of the day, you will learn about the Pivotal Cloud Foundry platform, building microservices with Spring Boot, architecting for resilience with Spring Cloud, and integrating analytics with Spring Cloud Data Flow. You will see first-hand how the platform and application framework come together to boost developers’ productivity by streamlining the workflow so they can focus on adding value.
Paris 7th July 2016
Register <[[http://pivotal.io/event/pivotal-cloud-native-roadshow/paris]]>
The agenda is meant to fit your needs and time availability. Come for the first half and see how Pivotal Cloud Foundry and Spring Boot can be brought together to create a continuous delivery pipeline. Stay for the second half and learn about the power of Spring Cloud to build microservice architectures and data analytics. The choice is yours.
Agenda 9:00 AM—9:30 AM Registration & Breakfast
9:30 AM—10:00 AM The Cloud Native Advantage Overview of the what, why, and how of a cloud native organization with a focus on principles and capabilities including people, process, and tools.
10:00 AM—12:00 PM The Promises of a Cloud Native Platform Walk through the workflows to build a pipeline to deliver microservices with Pivotal Cloud Foundry and Spring Boot.
12:00 PM—1:00 PM Lunch
1:00 PM—1:30 PM The Value Moves Up the Stack With the capabilities of a cloud native organization in mind, outline the value map of ownership and cost with regards to differentiated value and commodification.
1:30 PM—3:30 PM Architecting the Cloud Native Application Building up from simply deploying microservices to leverage cloud native architectures with Spring Cloud to create resilience and Spring Cloud Data Flow to integrate with a variety of data services.
Register now <[[http://pivotal.io/event/pivotal-cloud-native-roadshow/paris]]> for this exclusive event. The event is FREE; space is limited.
Questions? Please contact us via email <[[mailto:mdougados@pivotal.io]]> or visit our website.
